name: Lux-ray Discord bot
description: A Discord bot that help manage server

PORT.description: Which port should Flask run on

TOKEN_ALL.description:
Bot token use when run on both `dev` and `production` mode. (optional)
WILL OVERWRITE OTHER TOKEN SETTINGS

TOKEN_DEV.description: Bot token use when run on `dev` mode. (optional)

TOKEN_PROD.description: Bot token use when run on `production` mode.

DB_HOST_DEV.description: Database host uri use when run on `dev` mode. (optional)

DB_HOST_PROD.description: Database host uri use when run on `production` mode.

DB_PORT_DEV.description: Database host port use when run on `dev` mode. (optional)

DB_PORT_PROD.description: Database host port use when run on `production` mode. (optional)

DB_TYPE_DEV.description:
Database type use when run on `dev` mode. (optional)
Current only support `mongodb` type.

DB_TYPE_PROD.description:
Database type use when run on `production` mode.
Current only support `mongodb` type.
